title: inum paraamukham EnO
sahitya:
innum parAmukhamEnO-idu umakku nIdi tAnO 

(innum)



anupallavi



vannattogai mayilmEl vaLar-vayypuri vEl murugayyA 

(innum)



caraNam



mAnInra vaLLi magizhum maNavALA-mAdavar sEvita pankaja malar tALA

tEnOr  kaDampaNi tOLA-dhIrA vIrA shUra samhARA

(innum)
